audit_metadata.methodology: Manual code review of all 20 content pages

details.hierarchy: Proper typographic hierarchy maintained across all pages
details.font_weights: Correct - font-bold for H1, font-semibold for H2/H3

details.hover_states: hover-elevate class applied to interactive cards
details.glassmorphic_badges: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm border-white/30 in hero sections
details.spacing_consistency: Excellent - consistent padding (p-6, p-8) across all cards
details.border_radius: Proper - rounded corners on all cards

details.semantic_color_tokens: All pages use semantic tokens (text-foreground, bg-background, text-muted-foreground)
details.theme_system: Relies primarily on semantic tokens for automatic theme adaptation
details.hero_sections: 100% - all hero sections use text-white with dark gradient overlays
details.content_sections: 100% - proper dark mode variants for all text elements
details.color_contrast: Excellent - white text on dark overlays, proper muted-foreground usage

issues: No t() function calls for translation keys
All content is hardcoded in English
Missing i18n support for blog content, tutorial content, and UI labels
details.recommendation: Implement react-i18next with translation keys for all user-facing text

details.current_implementation: Only thumbnail images and Play icon overlays
issues: No actual video player component found
VideoLessonsPage only shows thumbnails with play icons
TutorialDetailPage has no video playback functionality
Cannot verify theming of non-existent video player
details.recommendation: Implement video player component with ocean theme styling

seo_implementation.details: All pages have SEO component with unique titles and descriptions

hero_sections.details: All pages have 16:9 hero sections (h-[50vh] md:h-[60vh]) with gradient overlays

motion_animations.details: Framer-motion animations implemented on all pages

data_testid_attributes.details: Interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing

error_boundaries.details: SelfHealingErrorBoundary or AppLayout wraps all pages

responsive_design.details: Mobile-first responsive classes (md:, lg:) used throughout

TangoHistoryPage.tsx.cards: ✓ PASS (excellent timeline layout with hover-elevate cards)

critical_issues.description: No internationalization support implemented on any content pages
critical_issues.recommendation: Implement react-i18next with translation keys for all user-facing content

critical_issues.description: No video player component implemented despite video-related pages
critical_issues.recommendation: Implement themed video player component for video content

strengths: Consistent editorial typography using Playfair Display for headings and Inter for body
Proper typographic hierarchy across all pages
Ocean-themed card styling with glassmorphic effects in hero sections
Dark/light mode support via semantic color tokens
Comprehensive SEO implementation on all pages
Proper 16:9 hero sections with gradient overlays
Excellent use of hover-elevate on interactive cards

recommendations.details: Add react-i18next translation keys for all hardcoded text across all 20 content pages. Create translation files in public/locales for en, es, de, fr, it, pt languages.
Create themed video player for VideoLessonsPage and TutorialDetailPage with ocean theme styling, dark/light mode support, and proper controls.

recommendations.action: Consider explicit dark mode variants for prose content
recommendations.details: While semantic tokens work, consider adding explicit dark:prose-invert to all long-form content pages for better readability.

conclusion: Content pages demonstrate excellent editorial typography, consistent ocean-themed card styling, and proper dark/light mode support. However, i18n support is completely missing across all pages, and video player functionality is not implemented. These gaps should be addressed for full production readiness.
